name: Altergeist Overwrite
text:
You can only use this Skill's second effect once per Duel if your Deck (excluding the Extra Deck) contains 9 or more "Altergeist" cards.
1: At the beginning of the Duel, gain 1000 Life Points.
2: From turn 2 onward, shuffle 1 monster from your field into the Deck, and then play 1 "Altergeist Fijialert" from outside of your Deck to your field in face-down Defense Position. (Its battle position can be changed.)
